title: Gitness
description:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋
Ever wondered about the hidden risks in your codebase? What if your key developer wins the lottery tomorrow? 🎱 Meet Gitness - your repository's personal fitness trainer that helps you track and improve your codebase's health metrics!
Made with ❤️ by developers, for developers.
P.S.: Don't wait until your bus factor becomes a bus accident! 🚌
